line: commence an arbitration proceeding. During the arbitration, the amount of any settlement offer made by
label: paragraph

line: you or Spotify shall not be disclosed to the arbitrator until after the arbitrator makes a final decision and
label: paragraph

line: award, if any. In the event our dispute is finally resolved through arbitration in your favor, Spotify shall pay
label: paragraph

line: you the greater of (1) the amount awarded by the arbitrator, if any, (2) the last written settlement amount
label: paragraph

line: offered by Spotify in settlement of the dispute prior to the arbitrator’s award; or (3) $1,000.00, whichever is
label: paragraph

line: greater. All documents and information disclosed in the course of the arbitration shall be kept strictly
label: paragraph

line: confidential by the recipient and shall not be used by the recipient for any purpose other than for purposes
label: paragraph

line: of the arbitration or the enforcement of the arbitrator’s decision and award and shall not be disclosed
label: paragraph

line: except in confidence to persons who have a need to know for such purposes or as required by applicable
label: paragraph

line: law.

line: 2 1.2.7 Enforceability
